events.description: Fired from Icon Event event. Records the time spent between events on the icon list.

Looks for a new item to add to the icon list via session attribute Icon Event Found, then sets session attributes Icon Event & Icons.
Stores icon in object and fires Icon Time event with duration since last icon event.
End of session summary event for reporting on icon events seen in session
Never firing event used as placeholder to populate session attributes and trigger events that are done through advanced mode

dimensions.description: Icons of icon events seen in session. Set as a string of emoji/strings separated by spaces
The time on a item in the icon list to the next icon event. Set in advanced mode by the Icon Event event.

The emoji/icon(s) of a item in the icon list.
Set in advanced mode by the Icon Event event.

dimensionGroups.description: The time spent from item to item in the icon list. Can filter by if an event is seen.
The events seen in the icon list. Can filter by if particular items are seen.

sessionAttributes.description:
Add events here which are items on the icon list to be recorded.
The events should have a value equal to the emoji/icon(s) to be displayed in the icon list.

Icon list of icon events seen in session.
Set from Icon Event.
The icon of the most recent item seen on the icon list
